coreAtributes.authorTag: A tag sewn into the inside of the back reads "Official Enforcer Issue, MFD by DSG Threadworks."
coreAtributes.name: heavy Enforcer's plate carrier
coreAtributes.description: A standard plate carrier Vest fitted with additional deltoid, groin, neck, and throat protection. It is intended for use in pitched battles rather than quick raids.

displacementText.playerSelf: You undo the cummerbund on either side of your plate carrier, withdraw your [pc.arms] from the deltoid protectors, and slide your head through the neck hole.
displacementText.playerNPC: You undo the cummerbund on either side of [npc.name]'s plate carrier, guide [npc.her] [npc.arms] from the deltoid protectors, and slide [npc.her] head through the neck hole.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You rip open the cummerbund on either side of [npc.name]'s plate carrier, push [npc.her] [npc.arms] from the deltoid protectors, and yank the rest over [npc.her] head .
displacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] undoes the cummerbund on either side of [npc.her] plate carrier, withdraws [npc.her] [npc.arms] from the deltoid protectors, and slides [npc.her] head through the neck hole.
displacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] undoes the cummerbund on either side of your plate carrier, guides your [pc.arms] from the deltoid protectors, and slides head through the neck hole.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] rips open the cummerbund on either side of your plate carrier, forces your [pc.arms] from the deltoid protectors, and yanks the rest over your head.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] undoes the cummerbund on either side of [npc2.name]'s plate carrier, guides [npc2.her] [npc2.arms] from the deltoid protectors, and slides [npc2.her] head through the neck hole.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] rips open the cummerbund on either side of [npc2.name]'s plate carrier, forces [npc.her] [npc.arms] from the deltoid protectors, and yanks the rest over [npc2.her] head.

replacementText.playerSelf: You slide the plate carrier over your head and tighten the cummerbund on either side of your torso before sticking your [pc.arms] through the deltoid protectors.
replacementText.playerNPC: You slide the plate carrier over [npc.name]'s head and tighten the cummerbund on either side of [npc.her] torso before guiding [npc.her] [npc.arms] through the deltoid protectors.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You shove the plate carrier over [npc.name]'s head and tighten the cummerbund on either side of [npc.her] torso as much as possible before pulling [npc.her] [npc.arms] through the deltoid protectors.
replacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] slides the plate carrier over [npc.her] head and tightens the cummerbund on either side of [npc.her] torso before sticking [npc.her] [npc.arms] through the deltoid protectors.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] slides the plate carrier over your head and tightens the cummerbund on either side of your torso before guiding your [pc.arms] through the deltoid protectors.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] shoves the plate carrier over your head and tightens the cummerbund on either side of your torso as much as possible before pulling your [pc.arms] through the deltoid protectors.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] slides the plate carrier over [npc2.Name]'s head and tightens the cummerbund on either side of [npc2.her] torso before guiding [npc2.her] [npc2.arms] through the deltoid protectors.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] shoves the plate carrier over [npc2.Name]'s head and tightens the cummerbund on either side of [npc2.her] torso as much as possible before pulling [npc2.her] [npc2.arms] through the deltoid protectors.

displacementText.playerSelf: You pull the groin protector on your plate carrier up.
displacementText.playerNPC: You pull the groin protector on [npc.name]'s plate carrier up.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You flip the groin protector on [npc.name]'s plate carrier up.
displacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] pulls the groin protector on [npc.her] plate carrier up.
displacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] pulls the groin protector on your plate carrier up.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] flips the groin protector on your plate carrier up.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] pulls the groin protector on [npc2.name]'s plate carrier up.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] flips the groin protector on [npc2.name]'s plate carrier up.

replacementText.playerSelf: You lower the groin protector on your plate carrier back down.
replacementText.playerNPC: You lower the groin protector on [npc.name]'s plate carrier back down.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You flip the groin protector on [npc.name]'s plate carrier back down, ignoring the wince on [npc.her] [npc.face].
replacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] lowers the groin protector on [npc.her] plate carrier back down.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] lowers the groin protector on your plate carrier back down.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] flips the groin protector on your plate carrier back down, ignoring the wince on your [pc.face].
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] lowers the groin protector on [npc2.name] plate carrier back down.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] flips the groin protector on [npc2.name] plate carrier back down, ignoring the wince on [npc2.name] [npc2.face].
